NOTIFICATIONS
2KXO is an ad-free, unlimited streaming service and global marketplace used to upload music, videos, voice recordings, photos or buy and sell products and services from anywhere in the world. Born and raised in the USA, 2KXO was developed by an elite team of agile developers in New York City. After three full years of development, 2KXO is now ready for its global release. Our encryption technology is one of the best available. As a e-commerce platform, security is vital to our very existence; as a result, 2KXO is constantly being monitored, reviewed, and updated to provide maximum privacy protection. To retain the trust and confidence of users, 2KXO provides a transparent environment, particularly with respect to personal information, by letting the public know exactly what information is considered important, how that information is collected, and what is done with it. Trying to choose from so many web services can leave you torn. You use one for social media, another for sending and receiving payments, and others for shopping and selling. “As a millennial, I grew up with the internet,” says 2KXO founder and CEO Hugo. “When I was younger, I used the internet for streaming music and videos, then for social networking, and eventually for commercial purposes. As I grew older, my use of the internet also evolved. I realized that I needed a platform that grew with me. I built 2KXO to be that platform, to provide all users at any level a single platform to do the things they love most: stream, shop, sell, send money, while staying connected.” 2KXO was conceptualized, in 2008 with aims to disrupt the tech industry with a bold new approach. 2KXO provides creatives a place to professionally organize media, merchandise, products, and services in one powerful, streamlined platform. Not only does 2KXO offer unlimited streaming and shopping, users can also set up automated Boost campaigns to quickly and easily increase engagements via automated targeting of highly interested users. With many individuals switching among a variety of online services, it can be quite difficult to manage multiple accounts while trying to keep up with the latest news and trends. So 2KXO created a platform to help users manage and consolidate their online interactions more conveniently on one single platform.\n\n2KXO™\nNEW YORK, NEW YORK\n(888) 611-8331 Post Media Post Media Sell Now Sell Now Post Stream Post Stream Existing shortcuts: Remove Disable Enable \u2022
